alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 05 at 10:59PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY... WHAT...Surfs of 13 to 16 feet WHERE...South facing showers of American Samoa WHEN...Through Sunday IMPACTS...Expect ocean water occasionally sweeping across beaches, very strong breaking waves, and strong longshore and potentially deadly rip currents. Some strong coastal erosion is likely. Very large waves may bring some ocean debris onto roadways, impact small harbors, and make navigating the harbor channel dangerous. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 1059 PO ASO TOANA`I AUKUSO 5 2023 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA E OO I LE ASO SA... MAFUAAGA...O galu e 13 i le 16 futu NOFOAGA...Talafatai i saute TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Sa AAFIAGA...Aafiaga FEOLOLO mai Lapataiga o Galu Maualuluga...E ono fafati malosi galu ma malosi aave o le sami. E ono iai sologa i gataifale ma e ono aumai galu maualuluga otaota o le sami i luga o auala. E aafia ai uafu laiti ma faafaigata ai ona folau vaa i le ava o le uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Sauniuniga mo Lapataiga o Galu Maualuluga tulaga FEOLOLO... E ono lolovaia nofoaga o loo latalata i gataifale. E ono tapunia auala o nofoaga maualalo aua faaputuga vai o le sami. Faalogologo pea mo ni faamatalaga mo auala ua tapuni ma nofoaga matala e ono sulufai ai. E ono tafea se tasi o loo iai i nofoaga maualalo i le sami ma e ono faaumatia ai ola.
info.instruction: Residents in vulnerable locations may experience flooding. Some roads in vulnerable, low-lying areas may be closed from floodwaters. Stay tuned to local officials for any road closures or evacuations. Anyone in low-lying and vulnerable areas could be swept out to sea and face significant injury or death.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
